did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: The collection consists of letters, newsletters and newspaper clippings pertianing to the Libertarian Party.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Libertarian Party Papers, 1993-1994, Accession #10187-ac, 10187-ad, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was given to the Library by Roger Lea MacBride of The Roney Plaza in Miami Beach, Florida, on August 10 and [December 15], 1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: There are thirty-six items, 1993-1994, concerning the Libertarian Party and its "50-state ballot status" for 1996. Among the papers are circular letters, newsletters, and newspaper clippings about the Libertarians. Included are twenty-one copies, January 1993-October 1994, of Libertarian Party News.
